page.title: 07SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {Language. Large numbers still unable to cope adequately & a surprising number still illiterate. {Social concerns.} Loneliness & loss of faculties amongst the elderly. Problems of alcoholism across the generations. High unemployment: & among non-self- motivated young this leads to boredom & abuses(vandalism,crime,brutality). Abuses of the social security system are well known amongst the villagers, some are quite bitter about this. {Attitudes. Insularity & stay-at-home common.Among the outgoing there is a good spirit of friendliness & from amongst these are formed all the functional groups & committees so important for our society.
